name: PiPi Box
description:
Hey there I'm Zawad Sharif. First time  I create this game. this game  asset copy from a YouTube who teaching game development. That Youtuber was create this game for windows. But i create this game windows, android and Linux.  If You  fine any bug please info me.

Player move: Right : D / Right Arrow Left : A / Left Arrow Jump : W / Up Arrow / Space For high Jump Long Press W / Up Arrow / Space
